azurerm_bot_channel_email.description: Manages a Email integration for a Bot Channel

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Bot Channel. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: The supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

bot_name.description: The name of the Bot Resource this channel will be associated with. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

email_address.description: The email address that the Bot will authenticate with.

email_password.description: The email password that the Bot will authenticate with.

id.description: The ID of the Email Integration for a Bot Channel.

create.description: Used when creating the Email Integration for a Bot Channel.

update.description: Used when updating the Email Integration for a Bot Channel.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Email Integration for a Bot Channel.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Email Integration for a Bot Channel.
